DOC.brief_title: Effect Whey Protein Supplementation Resistance Exercise Muscle Parameters Older Adults
DOC.criteria: Male Females 7085 yr Community dwell Short Physical Performance Battery score < 10 BMI = 2132.5 Acute terminal illness Mini Mental State Exam < 23 Myocardial infarction previous 6 month , symptomatic coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure Upper low extremity fracture previous 6 month Uncontrolled hypertension ( > 150/90 mm Hg ) . Neuromuscular disease drug affect neuromuscular function . Hormone replacement therapy eGFR < 30 mL/min/1.73m2 Types I II Diabetes Mellitus Dietary protein intake < 0.8 g.kg1.day1 Disorders nutrient absorption Milk , whey allergy Sulfa drug allergy PABAcontaining sunscreen
